Title: Kansas
Plot: Tommy decides to make life a living hell for his wife's new boyfriend by wreaking havoc on his business and finances. Meanwhile, Chief Reilly faces possible suspension as the result of an altercation with a fellow firefighter and Lou decides to share his poetry.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Siobhan Fallon,  Matthew Arkin,  Johnathan Tchaikovsky,  Donald Corren,  Peggy Scott,  Joe Murphy,  Lyndon Byers,  J. Bernard Calloway,  Sharron Bower,  Jack Conforti,  Larry McGee,  Dan Flood,  Eric Bini
